Name: Brawlerboo
Desc: Ten thousand en-nah forward punches as practice per day!

1.Name: Falling Bangboo Asteroid Strike!
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Charges up and rises into the air, entering the <color=#FFFFFF>Airborne</color> state. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Airborne</color> state, Brawlerboo will dive attack enemies when they're hit by a heavy attack from an Agent, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

1.Name: Opening Jab
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character: Brawlerboo enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Airborne</color> state ahead of time when the battle starts. The first dive attack's DMG is increased by 120%.

2.Name: Opening Jab
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>

1.Name: Scorching Wind Strike
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Jump up and strike continuously at enemies in a large area ahead, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
